result.value: pISA-tree: Standard project directory tree (ISA framework compliant)

This set of batch files is used to create standard directory tree for research projects. 
Batch files are provided to make standardized nested directories in accordance with the ISA Abstract Model levels (**I**nvestigation/**S**tudy/**A**ssay). 

Linked resources:
* [R support for pISA-tree](https://github.com/NIB-SI/pisar) [![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/214719940.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/214719940)
* [R interface for SEEK API (connection to FAIRDOMHub)](https://github.com/NIB-SI/seekr) [![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/253771274.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/253771274)
* [Community effort pISA-tree assay-types](https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree-assay-types) - enhanced with pISA-tree->ISA-Tab validation files

Installation: 
1. Download (zip file) or clone the repository from [NIB GitHub repository](https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA/archive/projects.zip).
2. Extract files into your local pISA projects directory (ignore or delete .git-related files).
3. User instructions are in the **INSTRUCTIONS** file.
batch-file, batch-files, directory-tree, file-management, isa, pisa-tree, project-management, windows

result.description:
## What's Changed
* reorganized for lib.cmd by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/51
* use Analytes.ini instead of AssayType.ini by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/52
* update Meta.ini files by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/53
* updated meta.ini by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/54
* make*.bat files find the root file by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/55
* call.bat file enabled by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/56
* ensure CRLF by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/57
* ensure CRLF by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/58
* change the library file name by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/59
* Develop by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/60
* fix search order for x.lib by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/61
* Develop by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/62
* changes and updates after webinar discussions by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/63
* Develop by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/64
* move batch content to library pISA.cmd by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/65
* Merging can be performed automatically. by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/66
* use pushd to temporarily map UNC network path to a drive letter form by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/67
* works also for UNC network paths by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/68
* the most recent phenodata on top by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/69
* Develop by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/70
* map temporary network drive by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/71
* Develop by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/72
* Changes in phenodata naming and sample selection naming by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/73
* Phenodata issues, v3.0.1 by @ablejec in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/74
* Create LICENSE by @zagorGit in https://github.com/NIB-SI/pISA-tree/pull/90

## New Contributors
